long_description: This E-Gel saddle is the ultimate choice if comfort is your number one concern. Its shape and shock-absorbing system provide maximum support. Dual Density Technology features multiple levels of support that maximize comfort. A firm foundation and rubber inserts molded into the seat's base absorb shock. Soft, open-cell padding merges to denser closed-cell padding to provide a smooth ride. Reactive-gel top layer adds extra comfort. A deep center groove and an anatomic cut-out in the base protects soft tissue and alleviates pelvic discomfort.
short_description: This E-Gel saddle is the ultimate choice if comfort is your number one concern. Its shape and shock-absorbing system provide maximum support.
